page.title: 20Recreation in Shelton
page.content: The only recreational facility that exists in Shelton are the swimming lessons that are given to the children of all the surrounding villages. This is a privately run enterprise which was set up as a new venture this year. The lady who runs the classes is a fully qualified instructor. She has also been on a course dealing with the giving of birth in water. Shelton shares the village hall with the village of Dean. There are often social event held in the homes of various people and fund raising for the church building also usually takes the form of parties in peoples homes.
